folder: Lily Pond Avenue & Galesville Court, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
Lily Pond Avenue, east side, between Galesville Court and Waterford Court, within the limits of Fort Wadsworth, United States Government Reservation. Robinson's map of 1898 shows this mansion to have belonged to J. B. Whitney, and Beers's 1874 map indicates it as the J.G.Ash mansion.
June 2, 1935
P. L. Sperr
(2)
a view of the rear of the house from near McClean Avenue.
The view is southeast.
June 2, 1935
P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Lily Pond Avenue - Galesville Court
